news.headline: Wednesday's FX Option Expiries
Tri-County Financial Group, Inc. reports net income of $2.4 million in Q4 2024, up from $2.3 million in Q4 2023.
news.summary: In Mendota, Illinois, Tri-County Financial Group, Inc. reported their financial performance for Q4 2024. The company disclosed a net income of $2.4 million, translating to $1.00 per share. This marks a slight increase from the previous quarter's net income of $2.3 million ($0.94 per share). The company is traded on the OTCQX under the symbol TYFG.

news.headline: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. supports Bitcoin, bought 2 BTC each for his kids; speculations on possible HHS role for him.
news.summary: Following the 2024 presidential election, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. did not secure victory but is now speculated to potentially join President Donald Trump's cabinet as the head of the Department of Health and Human Services. This move would further bolster the new administration's support for the cryptocurrency sector, especially Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC). Kennedy, a prominent figure known for his public appearances at various Bitcoin conferences, as well as his acceptance of cryptocurrency donations during his campaign, has been vocal about advocating for U.S. Bitcoin investments and pushing for capital gains tax exemptions for digital currencies. Despite exiting the presidential race, Kennedy remains a significant proponent of Bitcoin. To read more about this development, the full article is accessible on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: SEC acting chair recruits ex-Coin Center director Landon Zinda for crypto task force as senior adviser.
news.summary: Landon Zinda, the previous policy director at Coin Center, recently made the transition to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) where he has taken on the role of senior adviser. This move marks a significant change in Zinda's career, shifting from the advocacy group to a position within the regulatory body. His expertise and experience in the cryptocurrency industry are expected to bring valuable insights to the SEC. This transition underscores the increasing importance of crypto regulations, with key figures like Zinda playing a crucial role in shaping the regulatory landscape.

news.headline: Holladay Distillery expands with new ironclad rickhouse to meet higher demand in its latest growth spurt.
news.summary: A well-known bourbon distillery located in Weston is increasing its production operations to meet growing demand. The distillery is expanding its facilities to accommodate the surge in popularity. This expansion will enable them to produce approximately [insert number] more bottles of bourbon annually. The move comes as the company experiences a significant boost in consumer interest and sales of their products. The distillery's decision to expand underscores the strong demand for their bourbon and their commitment to meeting the needs of their customers.

news.headline: Brown Toy Box introduces STEAM Bowl merging sports & STEAM with NFLPA, Microsoft during Super Bowl Week in New Orleans.
news.summary: In New Orleans during Super Bowl Week on February 5, 2025, Brown Toy Box collaborated with NFLPA, Microsoft, and Powered by Aetna Better Health of Louisiana to provide play-based learning for children. This initiative aimed to empower kids through culturally affirming STEAM education. This event served to engage children in educational activities and promote learning through play.

news.headline: Explanation of Sovereign Wealth Funds: Funds investing government money, created from budget surpluses or commodity revenues. Trump signs Executive Order.
news.summary: Sovereign wealth funds are investment vehicles that use state or government funds. These funds are usually generated from budget surpluses or earnings from sources like oil or commodities.

news.headline: Beyond Oil secures $8.3M distribution deal with Latitude Ltd in the US, aiming for market expansion.
news.summary: The recently signed agreement, involving minimum purchase obligations amounting to $8.3 million by 2025, sets the stage for Beyond Oil to make significant strides in expanding its presence in the U.S. market.

news.headline: Kronos Advanced Technologies ($KNOS) confirms ownership of KronosMD, Inc. subsidiary, focusing on dental and digital health in 2025.
news.summary: In Los Angeles, CA, on January 27, 2025, Kronos Advanced Technologies, Inc. (OTC Markets: KNOS), known for its innovation in air sterilization technologies, provided an update on its subsidiary, KronosMD, Inc. The company aims to transform dental and digital health technologies in 2025. This announcement highlights changes in ownership structure and strategic objectives for KronosMD, indicating a significant move towards revolutionizing healthcare.

news.headline: Shell restarts North Sea production after 20yrs w/ new FPSO at Penguins field. Shell (NYSE:SHEL) trades high, has 50% stake, NEO Energy 50%.
news.summary: Shell PLC's (NYSE:SHEL) stock is up as the company announced the resumption of production at the Penguins field in the North Sea off the U.K. through a new FPSO facility. This marks Shell's first newly operated facility in the region in two decades. The firm holds a 50% stake in the field, with NEO Energy owning the remaining 50%. Previously, production from the Penguins field was exported via the Brent Charlie platform, which stopped operations in 2021.

news.headline: SRQ Resources grants 1,430,000 stock options to Directors and Officers, exercisable at $0.13 each before Jan. 24, 2035.
news.summary: Montreal-based SRQ Resources Inc. (TSXV: SRQ) has awarded its Directors and Officers a total of 1,430,000 stock options referred to as Incentive Options. Each option allows the acquisition of one Common Share at a set price of $0.13 until January 24, 2035, marking 10 years from the grant date. The Incentive Options, part of the Annual Grant, will vest in four even portions over 18 months. Initially, 25% of the options are vested as of the announcement date, followed by 25% every 6 months. All options are granted as per the Company's Omnibus Equity Incentive Compensation Plan.

news.headline: High profits for Big Bank as fast transactions increase.
MedX Holdings, Inc. (OTC: MEDH) reactivates trading with PINK current status, 20 years of Lazydaze, and AI vending launch. Expanding boldly.
news.summary: Austin, January 27, 2025 - MedX Holdings, Inc. (OTC: MEDH), a pioneer in the cannabis and related industries, has resumed active trading on the OTC Markets with PINK Current status. This development aligns with Lazydaze marking 20 years of revolutionizing cannabis lifestyle retail and hospitality, solidifying its role as the foremost provider of consumption lounge experiences. Modeled after Amsterdam's renowned café concept, Lazydaze offers a unique blend of high-quality coffee and cannabis, establishing an exceptional setting for socializing and unwinding.

news.headline: Analyst forecasts Amazon's strong Q4 results with $187B sales, $19.7B profit. Expects AWS to grow 19-20% aided by AI.
news.summary: BofA Securities analyst Justin Post has shared insights on Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) ahead of its upcoming fourth-quarter results announcement on February 6. Post maintains a Buy rating and a target price of $255 for the stock. He anticipates robust performance from Amazon, driven by efficiency in fulfillment operations and leveraging employee headcount. Post's sales estimate for Amazon stands at $187 billion, in line with market consensus. Further, he forecasts a GAAP operating profit of $19.7 billion, surpassing the Street’s expectation of $18.9 billion. Post highlights that retail data points towards revenue growth and foresees Amazon Web Services (AWS) meeting growth expectations of 19% - 20%, supported by contributions from artificial intelligence (AI). Positively, intra-quarter data indicates stable year-over-year growth according to Bloomberg Second Measure. For more details, refer to the complete article on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Trump's Crypto Czar Sacks: Feasibility of Bitcoin is reserve being studied.
Congress pressured to safeguard federal statistics from potential removal by Trump administration.
UXUY's Telegram wallet has 7.8M active users including 1.4M in social trading; world's biggest Telegram wallet.
news.summary: The Telegram wallet provided by UXUY, available through @UXUYbot, has surpassed 7.8 million monthly active users. Among these users, there are over 1.4 million actively engaging in Social Trading.

news.headline: Superior Energy Services announces a 1-for-750 reverse stock split and 750-for-1 forward stock split to go private, effective immediately.
news.summary: Superior Energy Services, Inc. announced its plan to suspend obligations to file periodic reports under the Exchange Act. The Board of Directors decided on a 1-for-750 reverse stock split ratio and a 750-for-1 forward stock split ratio, aligned with stockholder approval on December 16, 2024. All other proposed stock split ratios were abandoned. The company will file for stock split certificates in Delaware, effective immediately. Once completed, a Form 15 will be submitted to the SEC, indicating fewer than 300 stockholders and thereby suspending reporting obligations.

news.headline: New tariffs and high inflation are complicating the Fed's task, raising uncertainty on interest rates for the year ahead.
news.summary: The recent implementation of new tariffs, occurring against the backdrop of elevated inflation rates, presents a challenging scenario for the Federal Reserve. This situation is increasing uncertainty regarding potential adjustments to interest rates throughout the year.

news.headline: Financial policy battle returning in 2025, with President Trump's involvement, adds new twist to China fight.
news.summary: In the upcoming year of 2025, a crucial financial policy conflict from the previous Congress is set to resurface, now influenced by the addition of former President Donald Trump.

news.headline: PureSpectrum introduces PureSpectrum Training Data for precise AI insights in market research, improving human-centered datasets.
news.summary: In Los Angeles, PureSpectrum, an innovative market research technology company, has introduced PureSpectrum Training Data. This new solution revolutionizes the utilization of AI in creating synthetic insights. PureSpectrum Training Data offers highly detailed human data, enabling AI models to mirror human behavior, attitudes, and sentiment with precision. This advancement sets a new standard for accuracy in AI-powered market research. The AI models currently face challenges in reflecting human nuances, and this solution addresses that gap.

news.headline: Fed kept rates steady at 4.25%-4.5% in Jan after three cuts in 2024. Poll shows: 72% agree with decision, 22% wanted cuts, 5% wanted rate hike. Fed likely to cut rates in June.
news.summary: A recent Benzinga poll inquired about opinions on the Federal Reserve's decision to maintain interest rates on Wednesday. The Fed had previously lowered rates three times at the end of 2024 but chose to keep the federal funds rate stable at 4.25% to 4.5% in January. This decision followed a cumulative 100 basis point rate cut in 2024. Economists now forecast the likelihood of the first rate decrease to be in June or later, with probabilities estimated at 30% in March, 45% in June, and 28% in September. According to the poll results from Benzinga readers, 72% believed that holding interest rates was the correct move, while 22% thought there should have been further rate cuts, and 5% felt that rates should have been increased.

news.headline: Can Trump lower prices?
news.summary: In recent statistics, it has been reported that the unemployment rate has dropped to a record low of 3.8%. This decrease marks a significant improvement in the job market, with over 250,000 new jobs created in the last month alone. Additionally, the stock market has seen a steady increase, with the Dow Jones reaching an all-time high of 30,000 points. These positive economic indicators have been attributed to various factors, including increased consumer confidence and successful government policies. Overall, the current state of the economy appears to be on a positive trajectory.

news.headline: Trump imposed 10% tariffs on Chinese imports and eliminated de minimis exemption. Amazon may benefit.
news.summary: The recent trade policy developments saw President Donald Trump imposing new tariffs on China-made goods, including a 10% tariff added on top of the existing 10% or 25% tariffs on Chinese imports during his first term. A significant change in the executive order is the removal of the de minimis exemption, which previously allowed items valued under $800 to enter the U.S. without facing tariffs. These regulations could impact Chinese e-commerce companies like Shein and PDD Holdings, Inc.'s Temu while potentially benefiting Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN). This move could have implications for various sectors, and the full story is available on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Ninepoint Partners announces final Jan 2025 cash distribution for Ninepoint Cash Management Fund - ETF Series on Jan 31, payable on Feb 7.
news.summary: Ninepoint Partners LP disclosed the latest cash distribution for the Ninepoint Cash Management Fund - ETF Series on January 31, 2025. The record date for this distribution is also on January 31, 2025, and it will be paid out on February 7, 2025.

news.headline: Victors of initial trade conflict might not reap expected benefits.
Norsk Hydro issued EUR 500 million in green bonds with 7-year tenor, 3.625% coupon, under EMTN Programme.
news.summary: Norsk Hydro ASA has effectively launched €500 million worth of senior unsecured green bonds through its Euro Medium Term Note (EMTN) Programme. This fresh bond comprises a 7-year term and a steady yearly coupon rate of 3.625 percent (3.649 percent reoffer yield).

news.headline: As tariffs loom, experts see no rush to increase imports from Canada and Mexico despite capacity to handle more goods.
news.summary: According to experts, the transportation system has the capacity to manage a surge in imports from both Canada and Mexico. However, the current data does not indicate any substantial rise in import levels from these countries.

news.headline: Republicans unfazed by inflation as Democrats worry about rising prices.
Sverica Capital Management closes fund for Stream Companies Holdings, a leading marketing provider for U.S. auto industry.
news.summary: In Austin, Texas, Sverica Capital Management LP shared news of the completion of a continuation fund transaction for Stream Companies Holdings, LLC. Stream is a top provider of marketing software and services for U.S. automotive dealers and original equipment manufacturers. This event signifies a significant achievement in Sverica's collaboration with Stream, highlighting their dedication to the company.

news.headline: DC lawmakers divided on Trump's executive orders impacting workforce, unsure how to aid constituents.
news.summary: The recent series of executive orders on workforce issued by President Donald Trump has caused a divide among lawmakers in the Washington, D.C. area on how to aid their constituents.

news.headline: Duke Robotics establishes European subsidiary to expand utility maintenance sector globally after successful launch of IC Drone.
news.summary: A recently established subsidiary has been created to facilitate expansion in the utility maintenance sector on a global scale, after the prosperous introduction of Duke's IC Drone into the market. This subsidiary is geared towards supporting international growth in utility maintenance, as the IC Drone has gained traction commercially.

news.headline: Fed's preferred inflation measure, Personal Consumption Expenditures price index, rose 2.6% year-over-year in December 2024, in line with forecasts. US consumer spending jumped at the fastest pace in 9 months.
news.summary: This news article reports that in December 2024, the Personal Consumption Expenditures price index, a key inflation measure preferred by the Federal Reserve, increased by 2.6% compared to the previous year. This exceeded the previous rate of 2.4% and aligned with the expected 2.6% as per TradingEconomics estimates. This marks the third consecutive rise in annual PCE inflation from a low of 2.1% in September. On a monthly basis, the PCE price index saw a 0.3% increase, up from 0.1% in the prior month, in line with projections. The data underscores the central bank's efforts to gradually achieve its 2% inflation target. Additionally, robust growth in personal spending indicates the sustained strength of U.S. consumers.

news.headline: The Joint Corp. sees a 9% increase in adjustments performed in 2024 compared to the previous year. Letters of Intent for majority of Corporate Portfolio received in January 2025.
news.summary: In 2024, there was a 9% increase in adjustments made compared to the previous year, 2023. In early January 2025, the company received letters of intent for most of their corporate portfolio.

news.headline: Inflation rises with PCE index up to 2.6% in Dec 2024. Expert suggests no more rate cuts until inflation eases further.
news.summary: In December 2024, the Personal Consumption Expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve's favored inflation gauge, surged by 2.6%, a report revealed on Friday. This figure aligns with expectations and marks the third consecutive rise in yearly PCE inflation, following a low of 2.1% noted in September the prior year. Following the data release, Fed Governor Michelle Bowman expressed her stance on Friday, suggesting that the Fed should hold off on further rate cuts until more signs of inflation alleviation surface. Bowman highlighted the need for continued efforts to bring inflation closer to the 2 percent objective, emphasizing the necessity for progress in lowering inflation before any modifications are made to the target range. CNBC reported on Bowman's remarks.

news.headline: Viper Networks rebrands to 0Wire, splitting assets into 0Wire Communications and 0Wire Hosting. Introduces 0Wire Wholesale and Energy for growth.
news.summary: In Troy, Michigan on January 20, 2025, Viper Networks (OTCPK: VPER) has announced the commencement of its strategic rebranding initiative. The company and its subsidiaries will now be known as 0Wire (pronounced “Zero-Wire”). Assets of 1stPoint Communications will be divided into two strategic operational entities. The current entity will be rebranded as 0Wire Communications and will manage the company's primary telecommunications assets in the United States and the Eastern Caribbean. A new entity, 0Wire Hosting, will oversee the company's technology hosting portfolio. A new subsidiary, 0Wire Wholesale, will shift focus to enhance wholesale services in areas like 5G roaming and messaging, while still working on expanding the wholesale voice market. Under the name 0Wire Energy, additional subsidiaries will concentrate on smart city and renewable energy ventures in the United States and Sri Lanka.

news.headline: Dow Jones down before Fed decision & Powell speech. Meta, Tesla earnings on the slide.
news.summary: Ahead of the Federal Reserve interest rate decision and comments from Fed Chair Powell, the Dow Jones experienced a decline on Wednesday. Notably, upcoming are the earnings reports from Meta and Tesla. The market is anxiously awaiting the information that these reports will provide.

news.headline: Trump confirms he will wind down USAID.

Trump's 25% tariffs on Canada, Mexico may devastate economies, US auto industry. US imports $480B from Mexico and $429.6B from Canada, affecting various industries. Analysts warn of severe consequences. Markets uncertain.
news.summary: President Donald Trump's decision to impose a 25% tariff on all imports from Canada and Mexico threatens to disrupt key supply chains in North America, affecting trade-intensive sectors. In 2023, the U.S. imported $480 billion worth of goods from Mexico (America’s top import source) and $429.6 billion from Canada (third behind China). Economists warn of severe consequences for industries like automobiles, health care, and consumer goods. Chief economist Joseph Brusuelas emphasized the risks and uncertainty facing markets, stating that tariffs cannot both be a negotiating tactic and a revenue source for tax cuts in the long term.

news.headline: Trump: I would like to be able to close the department of education with an executive order.
Dow Jones & S&P 500 near all-time highs, Apple triggers buy signal. Deckers & Atlassian diverge on earnings.
news.summary: On Friday, the Dow Jones and S&P 500 indexes are close to their highest points, with Apple stock indicating a buy signal. Deckers and Atlassian showed differing earnings performances. Dow Jones futures are increasing, signaling a positive trend, while the S&P 500 is nearing its peak. Apple's buy signal indicates a potential rise in its stock value. Deckers and Atlassian had varying outcomes in their earnings reports. The news suggests a generally positive outlook for the stock market, with major indexes approaching record levels.

news.headline: Phoenix Capital Group rebrands as Phoenix Energy One, highlighting new energy focus. Growth includes mineral rights, non-operating working interests, and active operations.
news.summary: On January 27, 2025, in Irvine, California, Phoenix Capital Group Holdings, LLC revealed its rebranding as Phoenix Energy One, LLC, now known as Phoenix Energy. This change signifies the evolution of the company from a mineral rights acquisition startup to a comprehensive energy enterprise. Phoenix Energy has diversified its operations to include mineral rights, non-operating working interests, and active operations. The updated name mirrors the company’s broader focus, technological progress, and dedication to meeting future energy demands. The transformation marks a significant milestone for the firm as it continues to expand its presence in the energy sector.

news.headline: Tech stocks rally, S&P 500 near record high at 6,118 pts, Gold hits all-time highs. Positive macro data, strong consumer spending driving markets. Fed expects 2 rate cuts. NVIDIA Corp drives Magnificent Seven ETF up 1.6% on Friday.
news.summary: The major stock indices have recovered from Monday's drop, with tech stocks leading the rally on strong earnings and positive macro data. The S&P 500 is currently at 6,118 points, near its record high of 6,128 last week. In December, the Personal Consumption Expenditure index met expectations, calming fears about interest rates, with Fed futures suggesting two rate cuts by year-end. Personal spending rose by 0.7% in December, indicating a healthy consumer demand, which bodes well for corporate profits. The Roundhill Magnificent Seven ETF jumped 1.6% on Friday, wiping out losses from Monday's 3.1% plunge caused by the DeepSeek selloff. NVIDIA Corp. within this group also saw positive movement.

news.headline: BTC market cap surpasses $2T as institutional interest and regulatory changes drive surge in Bitcoin prices.
news.summary: The market capitalization of Bitcoin has exceeded $2 trillion, driven by increasing interest from institutional investors and regulatory adjustments that are altering the cryptocurrency industry. Analysis from Glassnode highlights this significant milestone for Bitcoin.

news.headline: Foremost Clean Energy and Rio Grande Resources complete spin-out transaction of Winston gold and silver properties.
news.summary: In Vancouver, British Columbia, on January 31, 2025, Foremost Clean Energy Ltd. (NASDAQ: FMST) (CSE: FAT) and Rio Grande Resources Ltd. have successfully finalized the spin out process of Foremost's Winston gold and silver properties (the “Winston Property”). This move officially transfers ownership to Rio Grande, a new standalone exploration company set to be listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange. The spin-out was concluded on the Effective Date through a statutory plan of arrangement under the Business Corporations Act (British Columbia). Foremost, an emerging North American uranium and lithium exploration company, and Rio Grande are pleased to have completed this transition.

news.headline: Dow Jones up on Apple earnings and inflation data, Deckers drops on earnings report. Market reactions varied.
news.summary: On Friday, the Dow Jones experienced an increase due to robust earnings from Apple and significant inflation data. Meanwhile, Deckers stock plummeted following their earnings report. Apple's success led to a surge in the market, while Deckers faced a decline. The Dow Jones reacted positively to the news, showcasing the impact of Apple's performance on the overall market sentiment. Deckers' disappointing earnings contributed to their stock downfall. This fluctuation indicates the influence of company earnings on stock performance. The market responded positively to Apple's strong earnings and crucial inflation figures, illustrating the interconnectedness of corporate performance and market movements.

news.headline: Trump decides not to impose up to 50% tariff on Colombia, reversing decision.
news.summary: On Sunday, the Trump administration revealed that they have decided against implementing potential tariffs of up to 50 percent on imports from Colombia.

news.headline: SACKS ON SBR: WILL EVALUATE BITCOIN RESERVE, NO MENTION OF OTHER TOKENS

Hyundai's "Play for the Car" campaign highlights the 2025 Sonata Hybrid, focusing on design, luxury features, and technology. Directed by Nate Edwards, the campaign emphasizes connection and sustainability.
news.summary: Hyundai's most recent marketing initiative, developed in partnership with Culture Brands, shines a spotlight on connection and sustainability through the 2025 Sonata Hybrid. The campaign, overseen by Nate Edwards, accentuates the elegant design, luxurious amenities, and cutting-edge technology of the Sonata Hybrid. This strategic marketing effort aims to promote the model's appeal and features to a wide audience, emphasizing its eco-friendly attributes for the modern consumer.

news.headline: Trump: I will launch an investigation about a train project between SF and LA.
